edu.stanford.math.nebtda
Class VectorDouble

java.lang.Object
  edu.stanford.math.nebtda.VectorDouble

public class VectorDouble
extends java.lang.Object

Implements vectors in Euclidean space.

Author:
Henry Adams, Atanas Atanasov

Returns:

getTangentSpace

public static VectorDouble[] getTangentSpace(VectorDouble node,
                                             VectorDouble[] incidentNodes,
                                             int tangentDimension)
Estimates the tangent space at a node by performing principal component analysis on the incident edges.

Parameters:
node - node
incidentNodes - incident nodes
tangentDimension - dimension of the tangent space
Returns:
orthonormal vectors defining the tangent space at the node
